name: Robin Wilson
description:
I’m calm, honest, hard working and very laid back, I love the outdoors, trying new things and enjoys a good book, I am a fun lover, ambitious and full of energy … I’m career driven and loves my job.I’m looking forward to meeting someone who’s loving, caring, God fearing and very Honest as they say is the best policy , I’m seeking for someone that enjoys living life to the fullest we can start as Friend which could blossom into something more,interesting.
I think communication is very important and I try very hard to do that as well as making it as easy as possible for everyone to communicate with me.I’d love a partner that I can share adventures with.
